siteMetadata.description: Joystream - видеоплатформа, которая принадлежит, контролируется и управляется своими пользователями.

hero.title: The streaming platform empowering
hero.subtitle: Built on and operated by the Joystream blockchain and DAO.

stepOne.title: Application
stepOne.subtitle: Each app brings its own discovery algorithms, terms of user policy, form factor and possible vertical focus.

stepTwo.title: Storage system
stepTwo.subtitle: All the video, images and assets in the system are stored on community run and incentived infrastructure.

stepThree.title: Content delivery
stepThree.subtitle: All videos, images, and asset in the system are delivered through a community run and incentivised low latency content delivery network.

stepFour.title: Public Blockchain Layer
stepFour.subtitle: Shared index of content, people and interactions. Content uploaded by creators in any app as well as channel's transactions and engagement are portable to any other app on the network.

ecosystem.title:
One platform.
Multiple apps.
ecosystem.subtitle: Joystream is an open source platform, with an open blockchain at its core, powering multiple video streaming Apps at once. Videos uploaded via any app built on Joystream can reach consumers of other apps on the network, allowing creators to expand their audience with the single account without extra effort.

appsBuiltOnJoystream.title: Check out apps built on Joystream
appsBuiltOnJoystream.info: We've just launched, so our app collection is yet to grow. Check back soon for more exciting apps built on Joystream.

gleev.name: Gleev
gleev.description: Gleev has its sole focus on the Web3 and Crypto content vertical, bringing together the like-minded creators and viewers around the shared passion of the present and the future of Crypto affairs.

l1Media.name: l1.media
l1Media.description: For education, news, science, entertainment beyond borders. First community-run gateway by founding members implementing new features and funding models to empower creators.

developers.title: How about starting your own video community?
developers.subtitle: Spinning up your very own app was never easier before. Configurable feature set, no-code approach, and support from the DAO lowers the set up barriers and lets you focus on your mission instead.

stepOne.title: Customize
stepOne.subtitle: Pick a name, logo & content theme. Update the design and make it yours.

stepTwo.title: Launch
stepTwo.subtitle: Make your webapp available to the world on your domain.

stepThree.title: Build
stepThree.subtitle: Build a community of creators and consumers around your business model.

stepFour.title: Earn
stepFour.subtitle: Get paid a share of the value the creators and audience generates.

atlas.title: Open source codebase with rich feature set
atlas.subtitle: All apps built from the Atlas open source codebase can offer the full feature set encapsulating NFTs, Creator Rewards, Creator Tokens Minting from day one and benefit from regular updates with new features released.

payouts.title:
Rewards for
publishing your videos
payouts.subtitle: Publishing videos can get creators cash rewards from the Joystream DAO council on a regular basis. More popular videos receive greater rewards.

carousel.title: Recent rewards from the Joystream DAO

info.label: Payments are made in JOY tokens
info.text: JOY token is a native crypto asset of Joystream blockchain. It is used for platform governance, purchasing NFTs, trading creator tokens, and covering the blockchain processing fees. We are in the process of getting the JOY token listed on popular exchanges, so you can buy or sell JOYs for FIAT currencies, such as USD.

videoNFTs.title: Video monetisation with NFT sales and royalties
videoNFTs.subtitle:
Videos can be turned into NFT minted on the Joystream network and put up for sale.

Creators can choose between fixed price, open auction, and timed auction. With royalties, creators can get a cut every time their NFT is sold again on any app in the network.

cta.title:
“This should be the greatest time
in history for creative people. And I think we might have finally figured it out.”

carousel.title: Recently sold NFTs on the Joystream blockchain

info.label: NFTs can be sold for JOY tokens
info.text: JOY token is a native crypto asset of Joystream blockchain. It is used for platform governance, purchasing NFTs, trading creator tokens, and covering the blockchain processing fees. We are in the process of getting the JOY token listed on popular exchanges, so you can buy or sell JOYs for FIAT currencies, such as USD.

hero.title: It’s time for the community to become channels' main stakeholder
hero.subtitle: Viewers can be turned into evangelists by holding a share in their favorite channels upon purchasing a channel token.

fundraising.title: Creator mint sell on their own terms
fundraising.subtitle: Token supply can follow the demand effortlessly with the Automated Market Maker, while the Custom Sale gives a creator complete control over the terms the token is traded on.

stableIncome.title: A stable stream of tokens every year
stableIncome.subtitle: Patronage gives creators the power to earn a regular annual token supply as compensation for their effort in curating the community and managing token economics.

secureListing.title: Yes to allowlists & vesting schedules. No to monkey business.
secureListing.subtitle: Allowlists put creators in charge of controlling the access to their token, and with vesting schedules (for both creators and buyers) everyone can get aligned and focused on the future.

shareUpside.title:
Support favourites and earn together.
Scout for future starts.
shareUpside.subtitle: Everyone can support creators to receive a portion of their revenue. Creators can reward their audience by sharing some of their channel's earnings.

availableActivities.title:
Not a creator?
Help build the future with us
availableActivities.subtitle: Joystream is a video platform managed by DAO, which means there are all sorts of ways you can join and earn by contributing to the project.

whatWeDo.title: Due to network effects, economies of scale, regulations and political interests, we are today left with a handful of massive institutions.

joystreamDAO.title:
Have a hand in shaping the future of Joystream.
Join our DAO.
joystreamDAO.subtitle: Pioneer is the place to participate in community governance and operation. Vote on elections, submit proposals or enter a paid role to support the platform growth.

jsgenesis.title:
We’re building
Joystream to set it free
